sentences.sContent: Their job was to identify enemy collaborators.
sentences.sCn: 他们的工作是找出通敌者。

remMethod.val: col(共同) + labor(工作) + at + or(表人， 名词后缀) → 合作者， 协作者

trans.tranCn: 合作者， 协作者； 通敌者
trans.tranOther: someone who helps their country’s enemies, for example by giving them information, when the enemy has taken control of their country
